dataObject.content: Two years after the Trump administration made the state-sanctioned kidnapping of children at the border official U.S. policy, the horrors around this crime against humanity continue to be exposed.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"I believe that is biased because it calls the US border policy (regarding children crossing the border and being separated from their parents) as 'state-sanctioned kidnapping' and a crime against humanity."}
{"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"Clear bias. Calling something state-sanctioned kidnapping of children is completely driven by personal emotions and beliefs."}
